entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre early this morning. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
